name: Money Maker Inc v0.3.1 [DEMO]
description:
Ever wanted to print your own money? Well now you can! (virtually)

LEGAL DISCLAIMER: MMI DOES NOT GUARANTEE ANY MONETARY VALUE FROM PRINTING YOUR OWN "MONEY"

STEP 1:

Shred your paper into sheets, your first step to financial success!

STEP 2:

Print those sheets so they look like the real thing!

STEP 3:

Slice those sheets up into little dollar sized pieces, you're almost there!

STEP 4:

Pack those dollars up and send em on their way!

LATEST PATCH NOTES

v0.3.1 (3/22/2023)

  • Fixed an issue with sheet spawn rate being tied to framerate
    • Sheet spawning is now independent of framerate
    • Sheets will now spawn near perfectly in line with printer and slicer with a ~95% success rate

PLANNED FEATURES

  • New game+ involving new ways to make money with their own mechanics
  • XP and leveling system
  • More ways to spend your money including decorations and upgrades
  • A vault where you can see all of the money you've stored

Developed and designed by BlueJay

Music by www.bensound.com

It'd be a huge help if you took a bit of time to fill out this survey when you're done playing: https://forms.gle/Hr5aHci72ahFXonH9
